Package sait.bms.problemdomain

Class ChildrensBook

java.lang.Object
sait.bms.problemdomain.Books
sait.bms.problemdomain.ChildrensBook
public class ChildrensBook
extends Books
This class is a subclass of the Books class, and contains unique attributes of authors and format.
Author:
Nathan Ryan

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String authors
    The String authors represents the author(s) of a ChildrensBook.
    private java.lang.String format
    The String format represents the format of a specific type of ChildrensBook.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ChildrensBook​(java.lang.String isbn, java.lang.String callNumber, int availableBooks, int totalBooks, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String authors, java.lang.String format)
    This constructor builds a ChildrensBook object with the five attributes of the book super class as well as two unique attributes, authors and format.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChildrensBook

      public ChildrensBook​(java.lang.String isbn, java.lang.String callNumber, int availableBooks, int totalBooks, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String authors, java.lang.String format)
      This constructor builds a ChildrensBook object with the five attributes of the book super class as well as two unique attributes, authors and format.
      Parameters:
      isbn - - Represents the ISBN number of a Book
      callNumber - - Represents the Call Number of a Book
      availableBooks - - Represents to number of a specific type of book that are available.
      totalBooks - - Represents the total number of a specific type of book.
      title - - Represents the title of a Book
      authors - - Represents the publisher(s) of a Book
      format - - Represents the diet type of a Book

    • formatToFile

      public java.lang.String formatToFile()
      This method is used to write an updated list of the book catalog to file.
      Returns:
